summary: Adds two lower level/duration invisibility spells to the illusion line, for thief/mage characters.
descriptionHtml:
This mod alters invisibility spells in the game, adding two new and a revised existent one (for one version).

----------------------------------------------------------------
Normal version
----------------------------------------------------------------

Apprentice level: Brief Invisibility, 10 seconds duration.
Adept Level: Extended Invisibility, 20 seconds duration.
Expert Level: Prolonged Invisibility, 30 seconds duration (normal).

----------------------------------------------------------------
Plus version
----------------------------------------------------------------

Apprentice level: Brief Invisibility, 15 seconds duration.
Adept Level: Extended Invisibility, 30 seconds duration.
Expert Level: Prolonged Invisibility, 60 seconds duration.


Both versions are interchangeable, you can use one first then switch it to the other, but use only one at a time.

The tomes of the spells can be bought by vendors (as Drevis). 

----------------------------------------------------------------
Know Bugs
----------------------------------------------------------------

The display will indicate the spells as Expert level, but it is only a display bug, they will behave and cost in a way appropriate to their levels, appropriate illusion perks will halven their costs and vendors will sell the tomes at the right moment. The bug is an hassle to remove for the way Bethesda managed strings. It would require modding of certain files I don\'t want to mod.


----------------------------------------------------------------
Versions log
----------------------------------------------------------------

- 1.04: corrected bug where apprentice and adept illusion perks didn\'t decrease costs of spells accordingly
- 1.03: made spells castable also with only one hand and made secondary version with more lasting duration.
- 1.02: upped a bit duration on apprentice level, 5 seconds was too low to do anything, at that point better nothing.
- 1.01: corrected bug that made tomes not cost appropriately to their levels.
- 1.00: first version of the mod.

----------------------------------------------------------------
How to install
----------------------------------------------------------------

Extract the archive somewhere
Go to: Drive Letter:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\
For those who don\'t have \"bought\" the game on steam put the files in the Data dir where you installed the game

1. Drop the Invisibility_Spells.ESP in the above folder
2. Launch the Skyrim Launcher, and click on \'Data Files\'
3. Tick the aforementioned ESP and click \'Ok\'


----------------------------------------------------------------
Data Files grayed out?
----------------------------------------------------------------
Go to: Drive Letter:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Skyrim\\SkyrimPrefs.ini

For those who don\'t have \"bought\" the game on steam, the SkyrimPrefs.ini file is located in Drive Letter:\\Users\\<USERNAME>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

Add these lines, or change them if they already exist so they match the below:
 [Launcher]
 bEnableFileSelection=1

If that fails:
 Go to: Drive Letter:\\Users\\[USERNAME]\\AppData\\Local\\Skyrim
 Make the Skyrim folder un-read only.
author: Lautreamont
